title: can't login
body: I can login to this website, but when I use the same password to login the game, it won't let me; it says "An unexpected error occurred while logging in. Please try again. If this issue persists contact support at support.riotgames.com". Is it just me or an issue with the client? I tried another account, did the same thing, same message.

replies.body: Seems like you might be having some weird errors within the client itself which should be fixed by running a quick repair in the client options, but if that doesn't work then there's a pretty good chance that your network is having a hard time getting a connection with our servers for one reason or another. Using a VPN as MC suggested might be able to help, since using a VPN can route your connection in a different way to hopefully get a more solid link. I'd also recommend going through and updating your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as well in case something is a little odd there.
Anyone else still having this problem?

I am having the exact same issue. I even contacted support. I have great internet connection to the servers and have never had this problem in the year I have been playing league. I've heard a lot of people saying they have had issues with this, therefore making me think it's the patch we are currently in. 

If you don't want to wait until next patch, I can tell you what I have found through reading many, many comments other people have posted on here having the same issue. You can connect to league through a VPN if you would like to. I use "Hotspot Shield" because it was the most recommended, but I in particular have super high ping on the VPN which isn't the best, but at least I can play in the meantime, before the next patch.

Good Luck. I hope this gets fixed soon as I would love to be able to play ranked again, but I am way too afraid to do so since my ping randomly spikes.
I'm having the same issue, I went through the troubleshooting connection issues guide, but I still have this problem
